name: LD39 - Until the lights turn off
name_original: LD39 - Until the lights turn off
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare 39.

You have stolen something very important and the security guard is after you. The area runs out of power soon. Try to find the key to leave without being seen by the guard.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • E to interact

Ludum Dare link: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/until-the-lights-turn-off

Windows version download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BzFeY4aNkboZRk1MNnVhcjNYQk0/view?usp=sharing
